definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: The consolidation and development of village political power at the grass-roots level is directly connected with the countryside safely.
sentences.chinese: 農村基層政權的鞏固與發展直接關係到國家的安危。

sentences.english: They disregard their own safety, to maintain the social peace.
sentences.chinese: 他們不顧自己的安危，維護着社會的安寧。

sentences.english: Waters keeps an eye on the trekkers and shares his tales.
sentences.chinese: 華特茲密切注意我們這羣旅人的安危並分享他的故事。

sentences.english: He was incapable of fear, meeting personal dangers with the calmest unconcern .
sentences.chinese: 他不知道害怕，置個人安危於不顧。

sentences.english: In the most obvious sense, it is the cost of life and safety.
sentences.chinese: 最直接的，就是個人的生命與安危。

sentences.english: He seemed careless of his own safety.
sentences.chinese: 他彷彿已把自己的安危置之度外。

sentences.english: Her actions manifested a complete disregard for personal safety.
sentences.chinese: 她的行動表明她全然不顧個人安危。

sentences.english: Andre fears for his father’s safety and wants to make a quick exit.
sentences.chinese: 安德烈擔心他父親的安危，想快點跑路算了。

sentences.english: Chen Tianfang regardless of personal safety to lie down under the bed began to dismantle the bomb.
sentences.chinese: 陳天放不顧個人安危趴到牀下開始拆除炸彈。

sentences.english: The captain of the passagership has the safety of thousands of lives in his keeping.
sentences.chinese: 這艘客輪上幾千名乘客的生命安危全維繫於船長一人。

sentences.english: Hong Kong is now at the watershed between stability and unrest. The central government cannot be too wary of that.
sentences.chinese: 香港現正處於安危治亂的轉捩點，中央對此不能不察。

sentences.english: The policeman ignored personal danger to save a little girl.
sentences.chinese: 爲了救一個小女孩，那名警察不顧個人的安危。

sentences.english: Prince Kui was a sober young man. He cared much about his country.
sentences.chinese: 太子悝是一位明理的年輕人，他深爲趙國的安危擔心。

sentences.english: Her actions manifested a complete disregard for personal safety.
sentences.chinese: 她的行爲證明她完全不顧個人安危。

sentences.english: Some of you delay your weddings.Like soldiers, you go to the front without thinking about your own safety and health.
sentences.chinese: 像戰士一樣，你們上了前線而根本沒考慮自己的安危。

sentences.english: Safety of the lives of tens of thousands of people, in fact, the most severe disaster order.
sentences.chinese: 數萬人的生命安危，其實就是最嚴厲的災情命令。

definition: to live or die/to exist or perish
in imminent peril (idiom)/on the brink of crisis
to give no thought to/to have no regard for/to disregard
to save from damage/to preserve/to maintain/to keep in good repair/(Tw) security guard
to concern/on (some topic)/about/concerning/to have importance for
to take into consideration/to attend to
facing a powerful enemy (idiom); fig. confronting grave difficulties/Enemy at the Gates, 1991 movie by Jean-Jacques Annaud
righteousness/virtuous cause/a woman's marriage/main points of a piece of writing
